environment_overview:
1) Two Samsung TVs have been detected: the Samsung The Frame (49) and the Samsung 8 Series (82). The Frame supports various capabilities including OCF, switch, audio volume, audio mute, and TV channel control. It is currently set to HDMI4 as its input source. The Samsung 8 Series also supports similar capabilities but is currently set to digital TV as its input source.

2) The current state of the Samsung The Frame (49) is powered on, while the Samsung 8 Series (82) is powered off. Actionable controls for both devices include the ability to power them on, adjust audio volume, mute audio, and change TV channels. The preferred method to power on the Samsung 8 Series is through its OCF capability, with a backup option available via the switch capability if necessary.
